page.title: 18MOTOR TRADE IN HARNHAM
page.content: The garages in Harnham differ one from another and represent varing aspects of the motor trade. Woodrows garage sells new BMW cars.It also services cars and sells petrol and has a small shop. Rex garage sells secondhand cars, services cars and sells petrol. Its shop also serves neighbouring houses along the Downton Road (A338) as well as motorists. It sells more petrol than Woodrows (400_500 customers per day against 300). Both are on main roads. Beeton's garage is smaller servicing cars, selling petrol and spares. It is off the main road in Harnham. Rex and Beeton's are family firms employing local labour. Woodrows is part of a larger company and its employees live as far away as Downton.
